scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points
scripts.create-shared-example-domains: npm run create-bank-application-dashboard-domain && npm run create-bank-application-cash-account-shared-domain && npm run create-bank-application-cash-account-account-details-domain && npm run create-bank-application-cash-account-transaction-history-domain && npm run create-bank-application-shared-domain && npm run create-shared-components-button-domain && npm run create-shared-components-table-domain
scripts.create-bank-application-dashboard-domain: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application bank-application --domain dashboard --prefix srlee --libraries data-access,feature,ui,util,shell  --addStorybookProject true --addE2EProject true --addComponentCommand true  --addJestJunitReporter true --routing true --strict true --enableIvy true --buildable true --style scss
scripts.create-bank-application-cash-account-acc: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application bank-application --domain cash-account/account-details --prefix srlee --libraries data-access,feature,ui,util,shell  --addStorybookProject false --addE2EProject false --addComponentCommand false  --addJestJunitReporter false --routing false --strict false --enableIvy false --buildable false --style scss
scripts.create-bank-application-cash-account-tra: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application bank-application --domain cash-account/transaction-history --prefix srlee --libraries data-access,feature,ui,util,shell  --addStorybookProject false --addE2EProject false --addComponentCommand false  --addJestJunitReporter false --routing false --strict false --enableIvy false --buildable false --style scss
scripts.create-bank-application-cash-account-sha: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application bank-application --domain cash-account/shared --prefix srlee --libraries data-access,feature,ui,util,shell  --addStorybookProject false --addE2EProject false --addComponentCommand false  --addJestJunitReporter false --routing false --strict false --enableIvy false --buildable false --style scss
scripts.create-bank-application-shared-domain: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application bank-application --domain shared --prefix srlee --libraries data-access,feature,ui,util,shell  --addStorybookProject false --addE2EProject false --addComponentCommand false  --addJestJunitReporter false --routing false --strict false --enableIvy false --buildable false --style scss
scripts.create-shared-components-button-domain: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application shared --domain components/button --prefix srlee --libraries feature,ui,util  --addStorybookProject false --addE2EProject false --addComponentCommand false  --addJestJunitReporter false --routing false --strict false --enableIvy false --buildable false --style scss
scripts.create-shared-components-table-domain: ng generate @srleecode/domain:create --application shared --domain components/table --prefix srlee --libraries ui,util  --addStorybookProject false --addE2EProject false --addComponentCommand false  --addJestJunitReporter false --routing false --strict false --enableIvy false --buildable false --style scss
